    A

    AbstractRobot - Class in uk.ac.keele.csc20004.robots
    Abstract class defining the main methods for a generic Robot.
    AbstractRobot(String, Frame, Motor[], Sensor[], Actuator[]) - Constructor for class uk.ac.keele.csc20004.robots.AbstractRobot
    The constructor allows to create robots with any combination of parts; however, there must always be a Motor, a Frame and an Actuator.
    AbstractRobotPart - Class in uk.ac.keele.csc20004.robots.parts
    Abstract class that implements the RobotPart interface.

    Constructor for an abstract RobotPart.

    CycloBot(String) - Constructor for class uk.ac.keele.csc20004.robots.CycloBot

    H

    HumanoidRobot - Class in uk.ac.keele.csc20004.robots
    A concrete implementation of a Robot.
    HumanoidRobot(String) - Constructor for class uk.ac.keele.csc20004.robots.HumanoidRobot
    A HumanoidRobot is defined by its parts: 2 Legs as Motor, a Torso as Frame a Camera as Sensor and 2 Arms and as Actuator.

    WheeledRobot(String) - Constructor for class uk.ac.keele.csc20004.robots.WheeledRobot
    A WheeledRobot is defined by its parts: 4 wheels as Motor, a Chassis as Frame and a Camera as Actuator.
